name: Slender Hentai Edition
description: This game is a classic indie horror. You are alone in the middle of a dark forest, no help will come and you can only count on yourself. Explore the location to find 8 drawings of anime girls, but be careful in your search, because in fact you are not alone here… There's someone else… And he gets very angry when you steal his erotic drawings. Look for anime girls all over the forest and remember the main thing. Don't look back!
